General.Name: Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, production, and sale of pharmaceuticals in China. The company offers Chinese and chemical medicines, raw materials, and intermediates. It is also involved in the research and development of products in the fields of ophthalmology, cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, respiratory, digestive, diabetes, tumor, and senile degenerative diseases. Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. is based in Dongguan, China.
